Of rugged steel his savage soul was made" -Albius Tibullus, _Elegies_ I, xi. ca. 25 B.C. trans. James Grainger, 1822.}} {{crawlquote|This weapon falls into the '[[Short Blades]]' category. It is a one handed weapon, and it is better for the dexterous.}} The '''cutlass''' is the short blade with the highest base damage, making it a desirable choice for both [[stabbing]] and actual melee combat (though [[quick blade]]s are generally considered more powerful, particularly when coupled with a high [[slaying]] bonus). Just be careful about using them on [[hydra]]s; although they are short blades, they can still sever hydra heads (unless, of course, they have the [[flaming]] [[brand]], in which case a skilled user can wield them against hydras to great effect). Cutlasses are fairly uncommon, but some early- and mid-game monsters wield them (such as the [[unique]] [[summoner]] [[Eustachio]] and the deep elves of the [[Elven Halls]]). Note that cutlasses are special-cased to have a minimum delay of 5, even though all other weapons with a base delay of 12 have a min delay of 6. ==History== *Cutlasses were retired in [[0.16]], and replaced with [[rapier]]s. *Prior to [[0.14]], this weapon was known as a [[sabre]]. {| class="prettytable" style="border:none; margin:auto; padding:0; text-align: center" ! || Common |- | '''Mundane''' || [[File:Sabre1.png]] |- | '''Magical''' || [[File:Sabre2.png]] |- | '''Artifact''' || [[File:Sabre3.png]] |- ! || [[Unrandart]] |- | '''[[Captain's cutlass]]''' || [[File:Captain's_cutlass.png]] |- | '''[[Arc blade]]''' || [[File:Arc_blade.png]] |} {{weapons}} [[Category:Short blades]]
